noun.description: A language belonging to the south-east Bantu group and the Tsonga subgroup, spoken by a people living in the Delagoa Bay area of southern Mozambique.
A member of a Bantu-speaking people living in the Delagoa Bay area of southern Mozambique.

adjective.description: Of or relating to the Ronga or their language.

origin: Late 19th century; earliest use found in Journal of the Royal Asiatic Society. From Ronga Ronga, self-designation.
